title: New: One Bit – Cold
body:
Having already worked with Will Heard, Ady Suleiman and Charlotte Ashdown, as well as writing music for the likes of Nokia and O2, it’s fair to say that Hertfordshire duo **One Bit** know what they’re up to.

With their [own studio](http://www.obpmusic.co.uk/the_studio.php) to record in alongside time spent at Liverpool Institute for Performing Arts, Jonty Howard and Joe Murphy are destined for the big time, and their debut track under the moniker ‘One Bit’ certainly showcases that. Cold is the sort of dancefloor / pop hybrid that could fit quite snuggly into the slickest Boiler Room sets, whilst also quite comfortably be played out to a bouncing nightclub.
